timeline.bodyText:
Should make this Configuration either entity agnostic or specific to TopicMessages in name i.e. RedisConfiguration <T> or RedisTopicMessageConfiguration
This was we have a foundation for reuse when we need to expand what we notify out
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Made it entity agnostic by introducing a StreamMessage (not sure about the naming) marker interface. So the redis serializers can now serialize anything that implements that interface.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText:
Can the log distinguish between Cancelled and Complete subscriptions.
Or have an OnCancel() and OnComplete() with appropriate log that call unsubscribe()
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Here it doesn't matter if the flux was cancelled or completed, this log is to denote the subscription status to Redis. As such, I've reworked the log to Unsubscribing from {}.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: Same shared configuration note on this one as previously

timeline.bodyText:
The class notes the general EntityId but is only applicable for AccountID.
This should probably be renamed to AbstractEntityIdDeserializer, then have an AccountIdDeserializer that extends this and passes in EntityTypeEnum.ACCOUNT
Similar to was we do with the EntityIdConverters
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Renamed to AccountIdDeserializer. We can add an abstract one once we have at least two sub-classes.
replies.author: steven-sheehy
